name: Mandrake Root
description: A potent root known for its magical properties. Handle with care.

name: Dragon Scale
description: A shimmering scale from the mighty dragon. Adds resilience to potions.

name: Phoenix Feather
description: A feather imbued with the essence of rebirth and renewal.

name: Eye of Newt
description: A mystical eye known for its transformative properties.

name: Wolfsbane
description: A rare herb used to enhance potion potency, but handle with caution.

name: Fairy Dust
description: Glimmering powder that adds a touch of enchantment to potions.

name: Unicorn Horn
description: A majestic horn with purifying properties. Highly sought after.

name: Mermaid Scale
description: A shimmering scale from the mystical mermaid. Adds fluidity to potions.

name: Goblin Earwax
description: Unpleasant but potent. Used in certain dark potions.

name: Basilisk Venom
description: A venom so potent it can be deadly. Use with extreme caution.
